formatting_rules: Start sentences with lowercase letters to create a more authentic, conversational tone.
Incorporate personal reflections and realizations for relatable, first-hand narratives.
Use short, punchy sentences to maintain an engaging, contemporary pace.
Avoid excessive capitalization or emphasis, which can come across as forceful or impersonal.
Structure content in a flowing, story-driven format rather than rigid lists or commands.
emotional_triggers: Nostalgia and personal growth narratives that tap into viewers' lived experiences
Vulnerability and truth-telling that builds trust and rapport
Relatable psychological insights that offer self-discovery and problem-solving
Suspense and intrigue that pique curiosity and encourage continued engagement
Empowerment and validation that inspire viewers to take positive action
